data.title: Perry Mason TV Series Wiki
data.text:
Opening

Starring

Raymond Burr as Perry Mason

Barbara Hale as Della Street

William Katt as Paul Drake, Jr.

Guest Stars

Jean Simmons as Laura Robertson

Robert Mandan as Dr. Emmett Michaels

Robert Walden as Robert Lane

Stephen Elliott as Elliot Moore

Robert F. Lyons as Pete Dickson

Gordon Jump as Arthur, the bank manager

Jonathan Banks as Luke Dickson

Stephanie Dunnam as Jennifer Parker

Leslie Wing as Det. Sgt. Linda Austin

Special Guest Star Gene Barry as Glenn (Glen) Robertson

and David Ogden Stiers as (D.A.) Michael Reston

Music by Dick DeBenedictis

(Original Perry Mason Theme by Fred Steiner)

Director of Photography Arch Bryant

Art Director Paul Staheli

Editor David Solomon

Supervising Producer Joel Steiger

Produced by Barry Steinberg

Teleplay by Anne C. Collins

Story by Dean Hargrove & Joel Steiger

Based upon characters created by Erle Stanley Gardner

Directed by Ron Satlof

Trailing

Executive Producers Dean Hargrove & Fred Silverman

Associate Producer Jeff Peters

Also Starring

Lucien Berrier

Julian Gamble as Bailiff

Virginia Gregory

Victor Morris

Dee Dee Olinyk

Norvill Rose

Pam Ward

Uncredited Actor

Larry Manetti as Robert Lane ofc mgr Pioneer Motel

Casting by Reuben Cannon & Associates C.S.A. & Carol Dudley

Unit Production Manager Barry Steinberg

1st Assitant Director Jim Nasella

2nd Assitant Director Scott Printz

Costumes by Ronn Rynhart

Men's Wardrobe Bruce Granger

Women's Wardrobe Judith Scheurwater

Make-Up Dee Sandella & Patti Dallas

Hair Stylist Judith Guilemette

Assistant Hair Stylist Brenda Moen

Construction Coordinator Randy Holland

Stunt Coordinator Dean Ferrandini

Transportation Coordinator Robert Benjamin

Set Decorator Anne Sammons

Property Master Susan (MacDonald-Peterson) MacDonald-Petersen

Production Sound Mixer James Emerson

Gaffer Ken Seagren

Key Grip Mark Combs

Camera Operator Chuy Elizondo

2nd 2nd Assitant Director Jeff Rafner

Script Supervisor Jeff Glasser

Production Auditor Norman Webster

Production Coordinator Kathryn Cole

Location Manager Sarah Liles

Legal Advisor Dennis Smith

Director of Post Production Brad Blake

Main Title Design Wayne Fitzgerald

Post Production Supervisor William S. Kerr

Assistant Editor Carter DeHaven IV

Production Executive Donna Colabella

Sound Effects Editorial Sync-Pop, Inc.

Supervising Music Editor Paul Clay

Re-Recording by Todd-Ao/Glen Glenn

Music Supervisor Ted Roberts

Music Editor Stan Jones
